targets.expr: avg(sys_cpu_combined_percent_normalized{job="cockroachdb", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$node", instance=~"$datacentre.*"} > 0) - stddev(sys_cpu_combined_percent_normalized{job="cockroachdb", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$node", instance=~"$datacentre.*"} > 0)

avg(sys_cpu_combined_percent_normalized{job="cockroachdb", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$node", instance=~"$datacentre.*"} > 0) + stddev(sys_cpu_combined_percent_normalized{job="cockroachdb", cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$node", instance=~"$datacentre.*"} > 0)
